message: As one of the co-founders, I really appreciate it
@byderekj Also, thank you for creating a group for the ISU Daily, that made me smile -- I went to ISU! :)
I thought his critique of the Old Spice campaign was good and eye-opening
@byderekj what about you, what stood out to you?
I had thought of that whole thing as a resounding success, but he's very right in that they kind of went about it the wrong way
@ericflo Yes for ISU! We need to keep in touch ;)
@ericflo ... for instance this could be forwarded to your feature request group or topic area
@ericflo what stood out to you in the book?
@ericflo the AJ Bombers example on how to always think about new ways of communicating with your community and not striving to sell to your community.

@ericflo just thought about a new feature for Convore... wanted to start a new topic and a link to the new topic would appear in this chat because the new topic would be about the Old Spice Campaign and AJ Bombers example.... and then also be able to forward something talked about in this chat like what we've done to that topic for others to discover since they really wouldn't discover that the best in this topic.... I hope that was clear :)
@byderekj yeah that's something we've gotten a request for before, we're still thinking about a good way to do it, but it would definitely be cool
@ericflo certainly everyone out there thought Old Spice revolutionized social media campaigns but they really didn't benefit the best from it
@ericflo awesome! I really think this would be a great way to communicate about many different topics. It just needs better organization ;)
